price: On that Day no soul will be wronged in the least, nor will you be recompensed except for what you used to do.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
